profile.headline: Engineering Leader | Expert management des organisations Tech
profile.summary: With nearly 15 years of leadership experience across engineering, product and management, I have led public institution, SMEs and unicorn through hyper-growth by structuring delivery, driving transformation and developing people.  My style is human, collaborative and results-oriented. I create the environment for people to grow, gain autonomy and find meaning. My leadership combines strategic vision and a coaching mindset, grounded in three core values: transparency, trust and excellence.  Recognized by my peers and direct reports for my ability to unite, motivate and inspire, I bring empathy, spontaneity and pragmatism. I challenge the status quo, test, learn and iterate, driven by my strong desire to contribute to the growth of a company, its products and, above all, its people.
